snippet.title: Horizon Forbidden West - Tribes of the Forbidden West | PS5, PS4
snippet.description:
RISE ABOVE OUR RUIN

The inhabitants of the world of Horizon are divided into tribes, each of which has its own history and traditions. As Aloy travels to the Forbidden West, she will encounter even more compelling characters...

In this special short, learn more about the rich and authentic tribal cultures Aloy finds in Horizon Forbidden West. 

Find out more at: https://blog.playstation.com/2022/01/06/take-a-closer-look-at-the-tribes-of-horizon-forbidden-west-including-the-utaru-and-tenakth/

©2022 Sony Interactive Entertainment Europe. Developed by Guerrilla. Horizon Forbidden West is a registered trademark or trademark of Sony Interactive Entertainment LLC.
